UPDATE system_menu A
A.menu_name=#{menu_name},
A.menulevcod=#{menulevcod},
A.supmenucode=#{supmenucode},
A.menuurl=#{menuurl},
A.menuico=#{menuico},
A.sort=#{sort}
WHERE A.menu_id=#{menu_id}
mapper.select: SELECT A.menu_id,A.menu_name,A.menulevcod,A.supmenucode,A.menuurl,A.menuico,A.sort FROM system_menu A WHERE A.menuurl=#{url} AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM system_menu B WHERE B.menuurl=#{superUrl} AND A.supmenucode=B.menu_id)
SELECT A.menu_id,A.menu_name,A.menulevcod,A.supmenucode,A.menuurl,A.menuico,A.sort FROM system_menu A ORDER BY A.menulevcod,A.sort
SELECT A.menu_id,A.menu_name,A.menulevcod,A.supmenucode,A.menuurl,A.menuico,A.sort FROM system_menu A WHERE A.menulevcod=#{level} ORDER BY A.menulevcod,A.sort
